content:
Ok, just looking at her background, doesn't look technical: Digital transformation and AI product executive specializing in delivering groundbreaking products, meaningful customer experiences and millions in revenue using data insights, relevant technology, effective product roadmaps and global teams.

✨What I love to do:

 ● Champion initiatives and products that transform the customer experience
 ● Deliver solutions that elevate the organization's AI footprint across multiple channels
 ● Influence enterprise-wide digital thinking and tightly align business goals with digital aspirations 
 ● Develop meaningful partnerships with agencies, vendors, and technology solutions providers
 ● Create processes that empower organizations to deliver rapid and effective results
 ● Select relevant technology and platforms to support the product roadmap and business goals

✨Industries: Financial Services | Fintech | Insurance | Healthcare | Technology | Pharmaceuticals | Media and telecommunications

✨A few wins:

 ● Led product, marketing and technology teams to deliver 100MM P&L. Established new delivery model using 120 member Agile “pods” to deliver quick, targeted solutions to twelve verticals simultaneously. Multidisciplinary pod of product owners, UX designers, developers, QA, BAs grew from one pod to twelve pods in 8 months leading to a 99% growth in digital revenue
 ● Digitized business model of 100-year-old trade association, resulting in 33% membership growth in the first year, 60% reduction in content delivery time, and more meaningful and relevant engagement with members
 ● Delivered $2.5 million in new revenue within the first 12 months of implementing global multi-channel digital strategy for insurance sales platform serving both internal and external customers in 3 countries across 6 lines of business
 ● Developed and delivered 12 direct-to-consumer programs in 12 months for pharmaceutical brand team

She's VP AI Products and Experiences at Comcast NBC
